title: IE sucks?
body: IMHO, yes, but now <a href="http://channel9.msdn.com/wiki/default.aspx/Channel9.InternetExplorerFeedback">I can complain directly to microsoft</a>.  There are also some good hacks there.  I wonder if this will help them make IE a <a title="real browser" href="http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox" >real browser</a>?
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-09

IE sucks?

IMHO, yes, but now

bodyNavItems.text: "We're not using these robots to hand out flowers"
